content.heading: HTML HEX Colors
paragraphs: A hexadecimal color is specified with: #RRGGBB, where RR (red), GG (green), and BB (blue) are hexadecimal integers that define the color components.

content.heading: HEX Color Values
paragraphs: In HTML, a color can be specified using a hexadecimal value in the form #RRGGBB.
Here, RR, GG, and BB are hexadecimal values between 00 and FF (equivalent to decimal 0-255).
For example, #ff0000 is red, as red is set to its highest value (FF) and the others are set to 00.
Similarly, #00ff00 is green, with green at its highest value (FF) and the others at 00.
To display black, use #000000, and for white, use #ffffff.
